primary

Class ConwayData

  • java.lang.Object
    • primary.ConwayData

  • public class ConwayData
extends Object
    This class if for underline data structure for conway application. It's is responsible for setting rules, data initiation, calculate cell live/die for every timestep.
    Author:
    Haijin He
